mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, image, user_idx, post_category_idx) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{userIdx}, #{postCategoryIdx})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE idx = #{idx}
update board set view_count = view_count + 1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT a.name, b.idx, b.title, b.write_date, b.view_count, b.content, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE board_idx = b.idx) AS recnt FROM member a, board b WHERE a.idx = b.user_idx ORDER BY b.idx DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(b.idx) FROM member a, board b WHERE a.idx = b.user_idx

SELECT a.name, b.idx, b.title, b.write_date, b.view_count, b.content, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE board_idx = b.idx) AS recnt FROM member a, board b WHERE a.idx = b.user_idx AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY b.idx DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(b.idx) FROM member a, board b WHERE a.idx = b.user_idx AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
